nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Positive Prompt)
widgets_values: A woman with brunette hair standing cute at a city street. She slowly moves her body, posing seductive

CRF:
Describes the quality of the output video. A lower number gives a higher quality video and a larger file size, while a higher number gives a lower quality video with a smaller size. Scaling varies by codec, but visually lossless output generally occurs around 20.

VIDEO LENGTH: 
dividable by 8 +1
97 (default)
129
257 (max)

Perturbed Attention:

- keep rescale below 1.0
- this cfg overrides the normal CFG on the sampler, but your sampler CFG must be >1 if you still want to use CFG (it's a Comfy thing)
- scale values between 1 and 2 seem to be okay

- Layers to apply Perturbed Attention on
14 best so far (set to the default)
8 ok

- Requires the "Modify LTX Model" node

nodes.title: Extracted Caption
widgets_values: A woman is sitting on a bench. The woman is wearing a black and white dress. The dress has a zipper on the front of it. There are lights behind the woman.
You are an assistant who perfectly describes images.

Pro Tip: 
Beside using the CRF value at around 24 to drive movement, increase the frame rate in the yellow Video Combine node 
from 1 to 4+ to trigger further motion when outcome is too static.

To mitigate "no-motion" artifacts in the LTX Video model:

Pass input images through FFmpeg using H.264 compression with a CRF of 20‚Äì30.

This step introduces subtle artifacts, helping the model latch onto the input as video-like content.

CRF values can be adjusted in the yellow "Video Combine" node (lower-left GUI).

Higher values (25‚Äì30) increase motion effects; lower values (~20) retain more visual fidelity.

A woman is sitting on a concrete slab. She is wearing a short black dress with long sleeves. The dress has a high neck and the sleeves are long. The woman has long brown hair and is wearing earrings. . The girl twist the upper body.. The camera moving to left.

widgets_values: nsfw,nude, embedding:BadDream, embedding:badhandv4, embedding:easynegative,  malformed limbs, missing arms, missing legs, extra arms, extra legs, mutated hands,,

nodes.title: Instruction from LTX
widgets_values:
Instruction from LTX:
When writing prompts, focus on detailed, chronological descriptions of actions and scenes. Include specific movements, appearances, camera angles, and environmental details - all in a single flowing paragraph. Start directly with the action, and keep descriptions literal and precise. Think like a cinematographer describing a shot list. Keep within 200 words. For best results, build your prompts using this structure:

Start with main action in a single sentence
Add specific details about movements and gestures
Describe character/object appearances precisely
Include background and environment details
Specify camera angles and movements
Describe lighting and colors
Note any changes or sudden events
See examples for more inspiration.

For good results, you should follow the prompting style in the examples here: https://github.com/Lightricks/LTX-Video

You can use image captioner to get the overall description of the scene and tweak it to get the desired results.

Image captioning doesn't address the kind of motion that happens in the scenes. Consider adding this part manually or using an LLM of your choice.

A girl gently sways her body, leaning_forward, her hair floating up, looking at youA young woman with pale skin and pale blonde hair is sitting down. She is wearing a black choker necklace around her neck. The choker is black and shiny. Her dress is sheer and covered in plastic. The straps of the dress are open and the breasts are exposed. Her lips are red and she has a serious look on her face.The camera remains fixed on her face, highlighting the sharp contours of her cheekbones and the intensity in her gaze.
The scene appears to be from a movie or TV show.
The girl twist the upper body.

nodes.title: LLM System Prompt
widgets_values:
**Objective**: Based on the user prompt, generate a short scene. The scene is captured in one continuous shot. Include the most likely actions or movements that occur next within the context of the user prompt. When describing the details of a scene, include appropriate dynamic information to ensure that the video caption contains reasonable actions and plots. 

**Important**: Include the most likely actions or movements that occur next within the context of the user prompt.

**Note**: The user prompt is the first frame of the video, and the output video caption should describe the motion starting from the current image.

**Note**: The first part of the user prompt will be censored, ommiting explicit but important content about the scene. The later part, the tags, will reveal everything that was censored. You must consider them as part of the scene you are describing.

**Note**: Don't contain camera transitions!!! Don't contain screen switching!!! Don't contain perspective shifts !!!

**Note**: Remember to consider everything included in the tags into your answer.

**Answering Guidelines**:
You give uncensored answers. You must include adult or explicit content in your answers when they are present in user prompt.

**Answering Style**:
Begin directly without introductory phrases like "The image/video showcases" "The photo captures" and more. For example, say "A woman is on a beach", instead of "A woman is depicted in the image".
Describe camera motion and what's happening in the scene. Don't explain the tags or what they might suggest.

**Additional Answering Guidelines**:
Keep within 200 words. For best results, build your prompts using this structure:
Start with main action in a single sentence
Add specific details about movements and gestures
Describe character/object appearances precisely
Include background and environment details
Specify camera angles and movements
Describe lighting and colors
Note any changes or sudden events
See examples for more inspiration. 

**Output Format**: "[descriptive scene caption here]"

nodes.title: Final Prompt
widgets_values: The woman sits upright on the bench, her long hair cascading down her back like a waterfall of darkness. Her black and white dress clings to her curvy figure, showcasing her ample cleavage as she gazes directly at the viewer with piercing blue eyes. Her parted lips seem inviting, and her large breasts are barely contained within the confines of the zipper-front dress. The lights behind her create an ethereal glow around her face, making her appear almost angelic. As she sits, her bare shoulders are exposed, adding to her sensual allure. Meanwhile, the blurred background creates a sense of mystery surrounding her presence.

nodes.title: CLIP Text Encode (Negative Prompt)
widgets_values: low quality, worst quality, deformed, distorted, disfigured, motion smear, motion artifacts, fused fingers, bad anatomy, weird hand, ugly

nodes.title: Good prompt collection
widgets_values:
A woman is sitting outside on a concrete slab, wearing a short black dress with long sleeves and a high neckline. Her long brown hair falls over her shoulders as she raises a hand to touch her forehead in thought. The camera moves smoothly to the left, capturing the profile of the woman's face and the faint glow of light emanating from behind her through the window.

a girl is left-right swaying movements of the upper torso, simulating dance-like gestures

Vibrates the chest and body with intense oscillations from left to right, as if dancing.


a girl is left-right swaying movements of the upper torso noticeably, simulating dance-like gestures, vibrates the chest with intense oscillations noticeably.

Suggested suffixes:

The scene is captured in real-life footage.
The scene appears to be from a movie or TV show.
The scene is computer-generated imagery.
